extendedInfo.description: Cisco Partner Education Connection (mPEC)Requirements:â¢	Compatible with Android 4.0 and greater.â¢	Supported devices: Samsung Galaxy S2, S3, S4 and Note I and II, Google Nexus 4 and 7 and Motorola RAZR (other devices may work but are unsupported and may have decreased functionality).â¢	Valid Partner enabled CCO ID  (To register, please go to http://www.cisco.com/go/partnerregistration)â¢	First time PEC users, please go to http://www.cisco.com/go/pec  and login with your CCO ID and complete login process. Cisco has been offering training to its partners since 1999.  This Android app will permit Cisco's Partners to access a subset of the training available on the Cisco Partner Education web site at http://www.cisco.com/go/pec.With mPEC (Mobile PEC), the new Android app you can access the training you need when or where you want to view it.  Access MP4 videos, PowerPoint files and PDF files all from mPEC.  Use mPEC to stay up-to-date with Cisco products, solutions, services, specializations and certifications. mPEC allows for flexibility in accessing sales and technical training and up-to-date information on Cisco products and solutions. This new PEC Android application:â¢    Enables PEC Training anywhere anytime â online or offlineâ¢    Expands Training capability to Mobile Networks on Android devicesâ¢    Contributes to the Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) concept (you donât have to have a Personal Computer)â¢    Contributes to just in time learning and enables you to sell and service Cisco products to increase your profitability while providing a higher level of satisfaction to your customersâ¢    Available to all Cisco Partners and Cisco EmployeesNote:  About Content: The PEC website contains over 6,000 pieces of content.  By partner request, the mPEC application is limited to a subset of content: MP4, PPT and PDF files added to the PEC within the last 120 days or older content that is still in very high demand.  Flash, Shockwave, ILT, LABs and other content not suitable for use on the Android devices are only available on the PEC by using a PC and/or MAC computers.  Features:â¢    Intuitive User Interfaceâ¢    Operates on both Cellular and WI-FI connectivity as selected on the Android deviceâ¢    Download MP4, PPT and PDF training content from the PECâ¢    Play downloaded content while offline or onlineâ¢    Select content by browsing relevant major and sub categoriesâ¢    Search content by keywordâ¢    Content icon blocks contain file size for making download decisionsâ¢    In browse mode, filter content sub-categories and/or by file typeâ¢    In search mode, filter content by language, published date or file typeâ¢    Sort content by title name - A to Z  â¢    Sort content by published date - newest to oldestâ¢    Training registrations updated in My Enrollments on the PEC within 24 hoursâ¢    Remove downloaded content as desiredâ¢    View PEC messages and announcementsCapabilities:â¢    Enables PEC Training anywhere anytime â online or offlineâ¢    Expands Training capability to Mobile Networks on the Android devicesâ¢    Contributes to the Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) concept (you donât have to have a Personal Computer)â¢    Contributes to just in time learning and enables you to sell and service Cisco products to increase your profitability while providing a higher level of satisfaction to your customersâ¢    Available to all Cisco Partners and Cisco Employees

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: What a convenience!!! Getting everything on the go.
reviews.author: jinesh doshi
